SEARCH
Package org.anchoranalysis.feature.session.replace

Class ReuseSingletonStrategy<T extends FeatureInput>

Object
ReuseSingletonStrategy<T>
Type Parameters:
T - feature input-type
All Implemented Interfaces:
ReplaceStrategy<T>
public class ReuseSingletonStrategy<T extends FeatureInput> extends Object implements ReplaceStrategy<T>
Always re-use an existing SessionInputSequential, invalidating it each time a new call occurs.

      Description copied from interface: ReplaceStrategy
      Find or create a FeatureCalculationInput to associate with input.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
